title: Bug 31627DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace
description:
Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8(Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver. : IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3
Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace
Description: Steps to recreate problem:1.
OB: When changing the perspective to CVS after adding a DBCS project to the workspace, a core dump occurs.
EB: The application should not experience a core dump when changing perspectives after adding a DBCS project to the workspace.
SR: Ensure that changing the perspective to CVS after adding a DBCS project to the workspace does not lead to a core dump. Additionally, review the CVS integration process for handling DBCS projects to prevent this issue.
